name: EKCuZC
description:
So EKCuZC is a simple game I and my classmate made for our end-of-the-year school project, which turned so cool I decided to share it. Learn more about how to play it in my video or on the help page. You can also play it on the "original page".

"raw_wind.mp3" by rivv3t
"Footsteps-Tile-Run-10.wav" by D W
"Footsteps-Tile-Run-11.wav" by D W
"Footsteps-Tile-Run-12.wav" by D W
"Footsteps-Tile-Run-13.wav" by D W
"Door-Handle-Jiggle-04.wav" by D W
"Fire sound" by CTCollab
The hole entering sound is from a game named Evoland 2.
